title: The Wind beneath their wings
creator_credit: Gwen Hancock, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: As a shy country girl, Gwen joined the Air Force when she was 18 years old and was posted at several locations around Victoria. Becoming a dressmaker after she was discharged from the army, Gwen married and lived life on a farm where she cultivated brown sheep, Shetland ponies and goats.
